item.title: Fine-tuning LLM vs In-context learning
item.description: This is my experience and experimentation that I did while building a product for the use case of using LLMs for our own data for question answering. If you’re doing something similar, this could be of some help. The most commonly used methods while using LLMs with our own data were typically Fine-tuning the model with your own data Using Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques Fine-tuning the model with your own data This is the initial method and follows the general structure of training a model
